name: Florian Silbereisen
description:
'''Florian Bernd Silbereisen''' (born 4 August 1981) is a German [[Schlager music|schlager]] singer and television host. Since February 2004, Silbereisen has been a television presenter of the show ''Feste der Volksmusik'' on German broadcaster [[ARD (broadcaster)|ARD]]. 

He was in a relationship with singer [[Helene Fischer]].
